fixes: Fixed an issue where BLE advertisement packets were not generated correctly under high load.
Resolved intermittent connectivity issues with the satellite communication endpoint.
features: Introduced interactive debugging tools in the Everything Hubble Portal for BLE APIs.
Added a new endpoint for dynamic encryption key management using hubble_ble_key_set.

fixes: Updated error handling in hubble_ble_init to provide detailed diagnostics.
Improved response formatting for hubble_ble_utc_set API calls.
features: Implemented support for precise UTC time synchronization using hubble_ble_utc_set.
Enhanced performance of hubble_ble_advertise_get with reduced latency.
Integrated detailed telemetry data in API responses for better monitoring.

fixes: Fixed minor bugs in BLE advertisement data processing.
Optimized caching of configuration data to improve API response times.
features: Launched the interactive Hubble API explorer within the Everything Hubble Portal.
Improved rate limiting and security for all Hubble API endpoints.
Added comprehensive logging to monitor API usage patterns and performance.
